      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius,
              double strokeWeight,
              java.awt.Color strokeColor,
              java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Creates a circle object
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the circle
        y - is the y coordinate of the circle
        radius - is the radius of the circle
        strokeWeight - is the width of the line that draws the circle
        strokeColor - is the color of the line that draws the circle
        fillColor - is the color that the circle is filled with

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        checks to see if the point passed in is inside the circle
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the point you are checking to see if it is inside the circle
        y - is the y coordinate of the point you are checking to see if it is inside the circle
        Returns:
        boolean true if the point is inside the circle, or false if it is not

        Parameters:

        Precondition: 
        drawer cannot be null
